p.s: We all need to do to business at some point in life , whether it 's a small trade or a huge business one .
It is important to think like a businessman for many reasons like to avoid fraud , earn a little cash , or stay out of debt , and this article will teach you how to think like a real businessman !

item.s: Do cost benefits analysis of things . this is the basis of most profitable decisions . here you are weighing up what you expect to lose in comparison to what you expect to gain and what benefits you will get from taking certain pathways .

Figure out the usefulness and benefit of products . usefulness and benefit of things often transcribe to whether or not the product is sell-able . when you analyse things look to see how much use it provides .
Have a vision .
A vision of what you aim to create is what draws people to you and inspires others to your cause .
A good vision will gain you many supporters and investors . it is useful to look at the visions of others to determine which visions are worthwhile .
Value your time .
Time is something you never get back and valuing it makes you spend it well .
Old age and death creep up on people before they are aware and they live with lots of regrets . managing your time well also makes people respect you .
Look to see how you can best organise people .
The organisation of people for a purpose is the fundamental aspect of a company . if you can organise people for a reason you can form a company and begin .
Pay attention to where things are going to waste .
A sense of wastefulness is paramount to reorganising your resources in a way that is best for you .
If you have no sense of where things are going to waste then you will dwindle accumulated wealth little by little .
Look at what is going to waste - energy , time , resources , skills and then find ways to use them .
Pay attention to innovative ideas and methods .

In this way , you develop a means to do things in ways that are more efficient . many people have it in their heads that the only way to do things is the way that it has been done for a long time , however , this is not based in reality and can be very time consuming for little reward .
If you 're not sure whether a trade is good or not be sure to ask a friend or family member to avoid getting ripped off !
If you are n't careful you may lose a lot of cash and/or items !

Do
NOT
make illegal trades/business deals !
You may not start thinking like one right away , but remember practice makes perfect !
